 23/// Ternary expression block type.
 24///
 25/// Template parameters:
 26///   :Operation: Ternary operation. Parametrized on value-type 
 27///               for elementwise operation, or on block otherwise.
 28///   :Block1: The first argument block.
 29///   :Block2: The second argument block.
 30///   :Block3: The third argument block.
 31///   :Elementwise: True if this is an elementwise operation.
 32template <template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
 33	  typename Block1,
 34	  typename Block2,
 35	  typename Block3, bool Elementwise = false>
 36class Ternary;
 37
 38/// Ternary expression block specialization for elementwise operations.
 39template <template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
 40	  typename Block1, typename Block2, typename Block3>
 41class Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3, true> : impl::Non_assignable
 42{
 43  typedef Operation<typename Block1::value_type,
 44		    typename Block2::value_type,
 45		    typename Block3::value_type>
 46  operation_type;
 47public:
 48  static dimension_type const dim = Block1::dim;
 49  typedef typename operation_type::result_type value_type;
 50  typedef value_type &reference_type;
 51  typedef value_type const &const_reference_type;
 52  typedef typename Block1::map_type map_type;
 53
 54  Ternary(Block1 const &first, Block2 const &second, Block3 const &third)
 55  : first_(first), second_(second), third_(third)
 56  {
 57    assert(!impl::Is_sized_block<Block1>::value ||
 58	   !impl::Is_sized_block<Block2>::value ||
 59	   !impl::Is_sized_block<Block3>::value ||
 60	   (impl::extent<dim>(first_) == impl::extent<dim>(second_) &&
 61	    impl::extent<dim>(first_) == impl::extent<dim>(third_)));
 62  }
 63  Ternary(operation_type const &op,
 64	  Block1 const &first, Block2 const &second, Block3 const &third)
 65  : operation_(op), first_(first), second_(second), third_(third)
 66  {
 67    assert(!impl::Is_sized_block<Block1>::value ||
 68	   !impl::Is_sized_block<Block2>::value ||
 69	   !impl::Is_sized_block<Block3>::value ||
 70	   (impl::extent<dim>(first_) == impl::extent<dim>(second_) &&
 71	    impl::extent<dim>(first_) == impl::extent<dim>(third_)));
 72  }
 73
 74  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW
 75  {
 76    if (impl::Is_sized_block<Block1>::value) return first_.size();
 77    else if (impl::Is_sized_block<Block2>::value) return second_.size();
 78    else return third_.size();
 79  }
 80  length_type size(dimension_type Dim, dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 81  {
 82    if (impl::Is_sized_block<Block1>::value) return first_.size(Dim, d);
 83    else if (impl::Is_sized_block<Block2>::value) return second_.size(Dim, d);
 84    else return third_.size(Dim, d);
 85  }
 86
 87  void increment_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
 88  void decrement_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
 89  map_type const& map() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return first_.map();}
 90
 91  operation_type const &operation() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return operation_;}
 92  Block1 const &arg1() const VSIP_NOTHROW {return first_;}
 93  Block2 const &arg2() const VSIP_NOTHROW {return second_;}
 94  Block3 const &arg3() const VSIP_NOTHROW {return third_;}
 95
 96  value_type get(index_type i) const
 97  {
 98    return operation()(this->arg1().get(i),
 99		       this->arg2().get(i),
100		       this->arg3().get(i));
101  }
102  value_type get(index_type i, index_type j) const
103  {
104    return operation()(this->arg1().get(i, j),
105		       this->arg2().get(i, j),
106		       this->arg3().get(i, j));
107  }
108  value_type get(index_type i, index_type j, index_type k) const
109  {
110    return operation()(this->arg1().get(i, j, k),
111		       this->arg2().get(i, j, k),
112		       this->arg3().get(i, j, k));
113  }
114
115private:
116  operation_type operation_;
117  typename impl::View_block_storage<Block1>::expr_type first_;
118  typename impl::View_block_storage<Block2>::expr_type second_;
119  typename impl::View_block_storage<Block3>::expr_type third_;
120};
121
122/// Ternary expression block specialization for non-elementwise operations.
123template <template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
124	  typename Block1, typename Block2, typename Block3>
125class Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3, false> : impl::Non_assignable
126{
127  typedef Operation<Block1, Block2, Block3> operation_type;
128  typedef Dense<operation_type::dim, typename operation_type::result_type>
129  cache_type;
130public:
131  typedef typename operation_type::map_type map_type;
132  typedef typename operation_type::result_type value_type;
133  static dimension_type const dim = operation_type::dim;
134
135  Ternary(operation_type const &op) : operation_(op) {}
136  Ternary(Ternary const &b) : operation_(b.operation_) {}
137
138  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return operation_.size();}
139  length_type size(dimension_type block_dim, dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW
140  { return operation_.size(block_dim, d);}
141  void increment_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
142  void decrement_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
143  map_type const &map() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return operation_.map();}
144
145  operation_type const &operation() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return operation_;}
146  Block1 const &arg1() const VSIP_NOTHROW {return operation_.arg1();}
147  Block2 const &arg2() const VSIP_NOTHROW {return operation_.arg2();}
148  Block3 const &arg3() const VSIP_NOTHROW {return operation_.arg3();}
149
150  value_type get(index_type i) const
151  { 
152    assert(cache_.get());
153    return cache_->get(i);
154  }
155  value_type get(index_type i, index_type j) const
156  { 
157    assert(cache_.get());
158    return cache_->get(i, j);
159  }
160  value_type get(index_type i, index_type j, index_type k) const
161  { 
162    assert(cache_.get());
163    return cache_->get(i, j, k);
164  }
165
166  /// Evaluate the operation to make this type usable as an ordinary block.
167  void evaluate() const
168  {
169    if (!cache_.get())
170    {
171      cache_.reset(new cache_type(impl::block_domain<dim>(operation_)));
172      operation_.apply(*(cache_.get()));
173    }
174  }
175  /// Evaluate the operation into the given result block.
176  template <typename ResultBlock>
177  void apply(ResultBlock &result) const
178  {
179    // If this expression was already evaluated,
180    // just copy the cached result.
181    if (cache_.get()) impl::assign<dim>(result, *cache_);
182    else operation_.apply(result);
183  }
184
185private:
186  operation_type operation_;
187  mutable std::auto_ptr<cache_type> cache_;
188};
189
190} // namespace vsip_csl::expr
191} // namespace vsip_csl
192

198/// Specialize Is_expr_block for ternary expr blocks.
199template <template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
200	  typename Block1,
201	  typename Block2,
202	  typename Block3,
203	  bool Elementwise>
204struct Is_expr_block<expr::Ternary<Operation,
205				   Block1,
206				   Block2,
207				   Block3, Elementwise> >
208{ static bool const value = true; };
209

212/// Specialize View_block_storage to control how views store binary
213/// expression template blocks.
214template <template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
215	  typename Block1,
216	  typename Block2,
217	  typename Block3, 
218	  bool Elementwise>
219struct View_block_storage<expr::Ternary<Operation,
220					Block1,
221					Block2,
222					Block3,
223					Elementwise> const>
224  : By_value_block_storage<expr::Ternary<Operation,
225					 Block1,
226					 Block2,
227					 Block3, Elementwise> const>
228{};
229
230template <template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
231	  typename Block1,
232	  typename Block2,
233	  typename Block3,
234	  bool Elementwise>
235struct View_block_storage<expr::Ternary<Operation,
236					Block1,
237					Block2,
238					Block3,
239					Elementwise> >
240{
241  // No typedef provided.  A non-const expresstion template block is
242  // an error.
243};

251template <template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
252	  typename Block1,
253	  typename Block2,
254	  typename Block3,
255	  bool Elementwise>
256struct Distributed_local_block<
257  expr::Ternary<Operation,
258		Block1,
259		Block2,
260		Block3,
261		Elementwise> const>
262{
263  typedef expr::Ternary<Operation,
264			typename Distributed_local_block<Block1>::type,
265			typename Distributed_local_block<Block2>::type,
266			typename Distributed_local_block<Block3>::type,
267			Elementwise> const
268  type;
269  typedef expr::Ternary<Operation,
270			typename Distributed_local_block<Block1>::proxy_type,
271			typename Distributed_local_block<Block2>::proxy_type,
272			typename Distributed_local_block<Block3>::proxy_type,
273			Elementwise>
274  const proxy_type;
275};
276
277template <template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
278	  typename Block1,
279	  typename Block2,
280	  typename Block3,
281	  bool Elementwise>
282struct Distributed_local_block<
283  expr::Ternary<Operation,
284		Block1,
285		Block2,
286		Block3, 
287		Elementwise> >
288{
289  typedef expr::Ternary<Operation,
290			typename Distributed_local_block<Block1>::type,
291			typename Distributed_local_block<Block2>::type,
292			typename Distributed_local_block<Block3>::type,
293			Elementwise>
294  type;
295};

297
298
299template <template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
300	  typename Block1, typename Block2, typename Block3>
301expr::Ternary<Operation,
302	      typename Distributed_local_block<Block1>::type,
303	      typename Distributed_local_block<Block2>::type,
304	      typename Distributed_local_block<Block3>::type,
305	      true>
306get_local_block(expr::Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3, true> const &block)
307{
308  typedef expr::Ternary<Operation,
309    typename Distributed_local_block<Block1>::type,
310    typename Distributed_local_block<Block2>::type,
311    typename Distributed_local_block<Block3>::type,
312    true>
313  block_type;
314
315  return block_type(get_local_block(block.arg1()),
316		    get_local_block(block.arg2()),
317		    get_local_block(block.arg3()));
318}
319
320template <template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
321	  typename Block1, typename Block2, typename Block3>
322expr::Ternary<Operation,
323	      typename Distributed_local_block<Block1>::type,
324	      typename Distributed_local_block<Block2>::type,
325	      typename Distributed_local_block<Block3>::type,
326	      false>
327get_local_block(expr::Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3, false> const &block)
328{
329  typedef expr::Ternary<Operation,
330    typename Distributed_local_block<Block1>::type,
331    typename Distributed_local_block<Block2>::type,
332    typename Distributed_local_block<Block3>::type,
333    false>
334  block_type;
335
336  typename Operation<Block1, Block2, Block3>::local_type 
337    local_operation(block.operation().local());
338  block_type local_block(local_operation);
339  return local_block;
340}

344template <typename                  CombineT,
345	  template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
346	  typename Block1,
347	  typename Block2,
348	  typename Block3,
349	  bool Elementwise>
350struct Combine_return_type<CombineT,
351			   expr::Ternary<Operation,
352					 Block1,
353					 Block2,
354					 Block3,
355					 Elementwise> const>
356{
357  typedef expr::Ternary<Operation,
358			typename Combine_return_type<CombineT, Block1>::tree_type,
359			typename Combine_return_type<CombineT, Block2>::tree_type,
360			typename Combine_return_type<CombineT, Block3>::tree_type,
361			Elementwise>
362  const tree_type;
363  typedef tree_type type;
364};
365

367
368template <typename                  CombineT,
369	  template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
370	  typename Block1,
371	  typename Block2,
372	  typename Block3,
373	  bool Elementwise>
374struct Combine_return_type<CombineT,
375			   expr::Ternary<Operation,
376					 Block1,
377					 Block2,
378					 Block3,
379					 Elementwise> >
380  : Combine_return_type<CombineT,
381			expr::Ternary<Operation,
382				      Block1,
383				      Block2,
384				      Block3,
385				      Elementwise> const>
386{};
387
388
389
390template <typename CombineT,
391	  template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
392	  typename Block1,
393	  typename Block2,
394	  typename Block3,
395	  bool Elementwise>
396typename Combine_return_type<CombineT,
397			     expr::Ternary<Operation,
398					   Block1,
399					   Block2,
400					   Block3,
401					   Elementwise> const>::type
402apply_combine(CombineT const &combine,
403	      expr::Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3, Elementwise> const &block)
404{
405  typedef typename Combine_return_type<CombineT,
406    expr::Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3, Elementwise> const>::type
407    block_type;
408
409  return block_type(apply_combine(combine, block.arg1()),
410		    apply_combine(combine, block.arg2()),
411		    apply_combine(combine, block.arg3()));
412}
413
414
415
416template <typename VisitorT,
417	  template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
418	  typename Block1,
419	  typename Block2,
420	  typename Block3,
421	  bool Elementwise>
422void
423apply_leaf(VisitorT const &visitor,
424	   expr::Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3, Elementwise> const &block)
425{
426  apply_leaf(visitor, block.arg1());
427  apply_leaf(visitor, block.arg2());
428  apply_leaf(visitor, block.arg3());
429}
430

432
433template <dimension_type D,
434	  typename M,
435	  template <typename, typename, typename> class O,
436	  typename B1,
437	  typename B2,
438	  typename B3>
439struct Is_par_same_map<D, M, expr::Ternary<O, B1, B2, B3, true> const>
440{
441  typedef expr::Ternary<O, B1, B2, B3, true> const block_type;
442
443  static bool value(M const &map, block_type &block)
444  {
445    return Is_par_same_map<D, M, B1>::value(map, block.arg1()) &&
446           Is_par_same_map<D, M, B2>::value(map, block.arg2()) &&
447           Is_par_same_map<D, M, B3>::value(map, block.arg3());
448  }
449};
450
451template <dimension_type D,
452	  typename M,
453	  template <typename, typename, typename> class O,
454	  typename B1,
455	  typename B2,
456	  typename B3>
457struct Is_par_same_map<D, M, expr::Ternary<O, B1, B2, B3, false> const>
458{
459  typedef expr::Ternary<O, B1, B2, B3, false> const block_type;
460
461  static bool value(M const &map, block_type &block)
462  {
463    return Is_par_same_map<D, M, O<B1, B2, B3> >::value(map, block.operation());
464  }
465};
466
467template <template <typename, typename, typename> class O,
468	  typename B1, typename B2, typename B3>
469struct Is_par_reorg_ok<expr::Ternary<O, B1, B2, B3, true> const>
470{
471  static bool const value = Is_par_reorg_ok<B1>::value &&
472                            Is_par_reorg_ok<B2>::value &&
473                            Is_par_reorg_ok<B3>::value;
474};
475
476template <template <typename, typename, typename> class O,
477	  typename B1, typename B2, typename B3>
478struct Is_par_reorg_ok<expr::Ternary<O, B1, B2, B3, false> const>
479{
480  static bool const value = false;
481};
